code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Home.css";import project1Image from"../Images/callback.gif";import project2Image from"../Images/table.gif";import project3Image from"../Images/redux.gif";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const projects=[{id:1,title:"Callback Task",image:project1Image,link:"/calling"},{id:2,title:"Table Generation",image:project2Image,link:"/Table"},{id:3,title:"Redux",image:project3Image,link:"/counter-redux"}];function Home(_ref){let{searchTerm}=_ref;const[likes,setLikes]=useState({1:0,2:0,3:0});const[liked,setLiked]=useState({1:false,2:false,3:false});const toggleLike=id=>{setLikes(likes=>({...likes,[id]:liked[id]?likes[id]-1:likes[id]+1}));setLiked(liked=>({...liked,[id]:!liked[id]}));};const filteredProjects=projects.filter(project=>project.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"counterContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:filteredProjects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.title,className:"cardImgTop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardBody",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"cardTitle",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"cardText",children:"See the project and choose what you need!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>toggleLike(project.id),className:"counterButton",children:[liked[project.id]?"‚ù§Ô∏è Liked":"Likeüëç"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:likes[project.id]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:project.link,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"View Project"})]})]},project.id))})});}export default Home;
